data.title: Phantom linux releases cause confusion
data.body:
http://software.opensuse.org/download.html?project=games:openra&package=openra provides downloads for 20141115 and 20141130, which arent official tags.

We received a report on IRC from a confused player who thought they were running the latest version and couldnt find any playable games.

data.title: Show games from all compatible mods in the server browser.
Added mod chooser graphics to the Tiberian Sun mod
data.body: ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/756669/5548703/856a4b44-8b78-11e4-80de-b09e12dc04ec.png)

data.title: Enable stances for helicopters in RA
data.body:
Commit enables stance changes for helicopters in RA. It also sets default stance
to HoldFire to keep previous behaviour.

Closes #7117

data.title: Fix soviets01
data.body: Fixes #7182 .

data.title: opengl read out bug
data.body: Nvidia geforce fx5500 has opengl 2.0 support but your games thinks it has opengl 1.5 support.I can verify that the previous version of the game used to run perfectly well.maxed out settings.

data.title: Fix d2k ingame-leavemap.yaml.
data.body: Fixes #7179.

data.title: Repaired Fort Lonestar map
data.body:
[Fixed](https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/7180/files#diff-058bf8510b263ff90d8d9483f8b34744R613) the instant win because of the short game option,
[added](https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/7180/files#diff-7a8e156d846a555ea42527ddb0fceac9R102) an "enemy units approaching" speech notification (hope that's okay),
updated fort-lonestar.lua
and added the map.yaml cleanup from #7164 .

data.body:
From https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/7178#discussion_r22216294 :

> <+Mailaender> it would be best to fix it with a scrollable field that displays the error

data.title: Polished the Dune 2000 shellmap to highlight both Carryalls and Sandworms
data.body:
I polished the shellmap a little. The Atreides artillery now has it's turret facing

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/756669/5538194/772ec33a-8aaf-11e4-9650-e93268d516f4.png)

towards the new Emperors outpost.

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/756669/5538185/60591494-8aaf-11e4-8892-d3e80db538cb.png)

Also a carryall will deliver the harvester and replace any sandworm damage so that this plays continuously.

data.title: Added an attack overlay for the sand worm
data.body: fixes the sand being immediately replaced by the mouth instead of overlayed.

data.title: Replaced the wormspawner editor icon
data.body:
I created a new symbolic icon that is distinguishable from the waypoint. My previous `W` is a little unclear.

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/756669/5237611/5502d3a8-7891-11e4-9950-379ba3934697.png)

It is inspired by the icon from http://d2kplus.com/maprenderer.php but using a unicode char â¨‚ instead of a Dune II sprite.

data.title: Implement hardware cursors.
data.body: This adds support for hardware cursors, and enables them by default for a big win in mouse responsiveness.

data.title: AI is unable to find targets for paratroopers superpower
data.body:
AirstrikePower, on the other hand, seems to work:

![screenshot from 2014-12-22 19 42 09](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4331210/5529364/4ec5518a-8a13-11e4-9cc6-6abac94cb467.png)

Will affect the new Tank Drop, too.

May or may not be a duplicate of #6899.

data.title: Remove BOM
data.body:
We need a permanent solution to this.
I propose adding something like [this](http://stackoverflow.com/a/3622153) to the makefile as a final step/new target.

data.title: Disable worms in preparation for a playtest.
data.body:
Worms aren't ready for primetime yet, so this temporarily disables them in preparation for a playtest.

We can reenable them in a future playtest after worm spawners have been added to our shipped maps and the graphical issues have been fixed.

data.title: Fix NRE in start game MissionBrowser IsDisabled query
data.body: @penev92 hit this.

data.title: Implement "Enemy unit sighted" notification
data.body:
OpenRA currently has no such notification, and I think it needs it.
This adds a trait for the Player actor to track all neutral/enemy units that the player sees and a trait for units/structures/creeps to announce themselves when seen.
Currently added to D2k units and the sandworms.
Not added to D2k structures and TD/RA/TS mods because I don't have the appropriate notifications. If someone could assist me with those I'll add them.
Also removed the "WormSign" notification on worm spawn, since it never belonged there.

data.title: Revert "Fixes AttackMove moving even if an enemy is within range."
data.body: Reverts #7067 to fix #7128.

data.title: Escape dev commands for chatting.
data.body:
Allow chatting command strings if prefixed with "//" instead of executing (with a prefix of "/").

> Newbie01: Hey Phrohdoh, how did you give yourself cash?
> Phrohdoh: /givecash

We could either do this or players can prefix their message with a space (as is possible already).

data.title: Some carryall fixes
data.body: Add carryall edge production and other minor improvements.

data.title: Unit response issue
data.body: If you create a control group with a single unit (haven't tested with more, but it really doesn't matter) every time you press that control group's hotkey the unit response is played twice.

data.title: Added AppVeyor support
data.body: This adds another continuous integration service: https://ci.appveyor.com/project/OpenRA/openra/ that is free for Open Source projects. It runs the build on Windows machines using .NET to test our IDE/msbuild project files and the PowerShell scripts. It also runs the NUnit tests from #6797 and stores the results. Yes, some of them are still failing. This may urge us to finally fix the MiniYAML merge code. Also some people had trouble running them https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/6984 so this should simplify it.

data.title: Ported survival02 to lua
data.body:
What this PR does:
- Ported survival02 to lua
- Added a lua functions for airstrikes (spyplane, parabombs)
- Added a lua function for paratroopers and replaced the "old paradrop methods"

Still to do:
- [x] Teach the lua-c# bridge how to use nullable types (WPos?) - _this PR does not needed that anymore_
- [x] [This](https://github.com/abcdefg30/OpenRA/commit/be6cb0537635f5aae7f11caf93db310213d45572#diff-61cd027831d09aa05e113bf2de1593a4R149) doesn't seem to be done correctly, I'll have another look at it -- _should be fixed now_
- [x] Soviets are _no longer_ killed by their own mines
- [x] Add_ed_ guards for the soviet harvesters

data.title: Strange VS2008 sln in D2k project
data.body: Do we need that .sln in Mods.D2k? Looks pretty left-over-ish to me.

data.title: Further RA project cleanup
data.body: This is just another migration/cleanup PR, depending on #7161.

data.title: Dissolve Move, Infiltration and Crates namespaces
data.body:
More preparation to make the transition to Mods.Common a little easier.

NOTE: Please give the Attack changes some special attention, I had to make AttackTurreted public to move AttackPopupTurreted, not sure whether that might have any unwanted side-effects.

data.title: Password Protected IngameMatch-Message has wrong title
data.body: when i join a lan game which is password protected, then i got a message with title like "Connection error" the Message title should be "Password required" or "Authentification required" but not "Connection Error" like style :(

data.title: Add a scroll function to the sidebar to avoid clipping on low-res screens.
data.body:
Hi again guys. Recently a friend on sleipnirstuff noticed after capturing tech from tree factions in my Tiberian Origins mod that you can't build units from the 3rd or 4th side because they are too low on the sidebar and they do not show up. This occurs on
 machines with a resolution of 1366x768 and lower. I had no such problems on my 1920x1080 monitor, but I was able to reproduce the problem on my Asus T100TA. Further clipping occured when I tested the game on a netbook with 1024x600 resolution.

I think this would be fixed if you added a scroll function to the sidebar to accommodate devices with low-resolution screens. 

![openra 2014-12-20 21-22-47-95](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6204538/5516010/9ee56eba-888e-11e4-9946-64c52c506437.jpg)

![openra 2014-12-20 21-22-54-25](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6204538/5516016/a8be7120-888e-11e4-9ff2-1c7978e8fc1a.jpg)
